caption:
This photograph depicts a group of men gathered outdoors, seemingly engaged in a serious discussion or listening to a speaker who is pointing with his right hand. The men appear as a diverse group, primarily in terms of age and attire, suggesting a professional or business context.

Key features and elements include:
- The central figure is a bespectacled man in a white shirt and dark tie, who looks assertive as he gestures with his hand.
- Other individuals in the image include men in diverse outfits ranging from suits and ties to more casual attire such as short-sleeved shirts and light-colored pants.
- The men are variously standing attentively, some with folded arms and others with hands in pockets or adjusting their glasses.
- The background is slightly blurred but shows greenery and parts of urban building structures, suggesting that the setting might be a courtyard or a side street in a city.
- The mood of the gathering appears serious, indicated by the facial expressions and body language focused toward the man who seems to be addressing or leading the group.
title: Preacher draws lunchtime crowd in lower Manhattan's battery park
